title: Error with remake
body: Just got out of a ranked game with my friend and we had someone DC at the beginning. We never got the option to /remake and were just "s-o-l" from the start. Not sure where i should put this just kinda salty about it because she demoted.

replies.body: There are a few different guidelines that need to be met in order for a remake to be available, and a few others that will prevent it from happening such as someone getting first blood before the dc/afk happens. Make sure to double check the [**/remake requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686)!
